verses.verse: Now <S%H7141>Korah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> with <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H203>On<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6431>Peleth,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> [action,]

and they <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> together with <S%H376>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H7148>chosen<s%> in the <S%H4150>assembly,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown.<s%>

And they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You have gone <S%H7227>far<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of them, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in their <S%H8432>midst;<s%> so <S%H4069>why<s%> do you <S%H5375>exalt<s%> yourselves <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?"
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [this,] he <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face;<s%>

and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5712>company,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1242>"Tomorrow<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3045>show<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is His, and who is <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and will <S%H7126>bring<s%> [him] <S%H7126>near<s%> to Himself; even the one <S%H834>whom<s%> He will <S%H977>choose,<s%> He will <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to Himself.
<S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H2088>this:<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4289>censers<s%> for yourselves, <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5712>company,<s%>

and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in them, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> upon them in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> [shall be] the <S%H6918>one<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%> You have gone <S%H7227>far<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi!<s%> "
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%>

is it not <S%H4592>enough<s%> for you that the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the [rest of] the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7126>bring<s%> you <S%H7126>near<s%> to Himself, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to them;

and that He has <S%H7126>brought<s%> you <S%H7126>near,<s%> [Korah,] and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> with you? And are you <S%H1245>seeking<s%> for the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%>?

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5712>company<s%> are <S%H3259>gathered<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> but as for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H4100>who<s%> is he that you <S%H9235>grumble<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him?"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H7121>summons<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab;<s%> but they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will not <S%H5927>come<s%> up.

"Is it not <S%H4592>enough<s%> that you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> to have us <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> but you would <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8323>lord<s%> it <S%H5921>over<s%> us?

<S%H637>"Indeed,<s%> you have not <S%H935>brought<s%> us into a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have you <S%H5414>given<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%> Would you <S%H5365>put<s%> out the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>? We will not <S%H5927>come<s%> up!"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2734>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Do not <S%H6437>regard<s%> their <S%H4503>offering!<s%> I have not <S%H5375>taken<s%> a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H2543>donkey<s%> from them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> have I <S%H7489>done<s%> <S%H7489>harm<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of them."

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> "You and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5712>company<s%> be <S%H1961>present<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> both you and they along with <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

"And <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H4289>firepan<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it, and <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H4289>censer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4289>firepans;<s%> also you and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> [shall] <S%H376>each<s%> [bring] his <S%H4289>firepan.<s%>"

So they <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his [own] <S%H4289>censer<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on it, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it; and they <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

Thus <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H914>"Separate<s%> yourselves from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them <S%H7281>instantly.<s%>"

But they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H410>God,<s%> Thou <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> when <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> wilt Thou be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%>?"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>'Get<s%> <S%H5927>back<s%> from <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>'"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> him,

and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5493>"Depart<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> from the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to them, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H5595>swept<s%> <S%H5595>away<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9128>sin.<s%>"

So they <S%H5927>got<s%> <S%H5927>back<s%> from <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram;<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out [and] <S%H5324>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of their <S%H168>tents,<s%> along with their <S%H802>wives<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "By <S%H2088>this<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>deeds;<s%> for this is not my <S%H4480>doing.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>men<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> or if they <S%H6485>suffer<s%> the <S%H6486>fate<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> [then] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1254>brings<s%> <S%H1254>about<s%> an <S%H1278>entirely<s%> <S%H1278>new<s%> <S%H1278>thing<s%> and the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H6475>opens<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1104>swallows<s%> them up with <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H1992>theirs,<s%> and they <S%H3381>descend<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> then you will <S%H3045>understand<s%> that <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H5006>spurned<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that the <S%H127>ground<s%> that was <S%H8478>under<s%> them <S%H1234>split<s%> <S%H1234>open;<s%>

and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them up, and their <S%H1004>households,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> belonged to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> with [their] <S%H7399>possessions.<s%>

So they and <S%H3605>all<s%> that belonged to them <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3680>closed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and they perished from the <S%H6>midst<s%> of the <S%H8432>assembly.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H5439>around<s%> them <S%H5127>fled<s%> at their <S%H6963>outcry,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H1104>swallow<s%> us up!"

<S%H784>Fire<s%> also <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who were <S%H7126>offering<s%> the <S%H7004>incense.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> up the <S%H4289>censers<s%> out of the <S%H996>midst<s%> of the <S%H8316>blaze,<s%> for they are <S%H6942>holy;<s%> and you <S%H2219>scatter<s%> the <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H784>coals<s%> <S%H1973>abroad.<s%>

"As for the <S%H4289>censers<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2400>men<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H2400>who<s%> have <S%H2400>sinned<s%> at the cost of their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> let them be <S%H6213>made<s%> into <S%H7555>hammered<s%> <S%H9449>sheets<s%> for a <S%H6826>plating<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> they did <S%H7126>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and they are <S%H6942>holy;<s%> and they shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4289>censers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the men who were <S%H8313>burned<s%> had <S%H7126>offered;<s%> and they <S%H7554>hammered<s%> them out as a <S%H6826>plating<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%>

as a <S%H2146>reminder<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>layman<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not of the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> should <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> that he might not <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and his <S%H5712>company<s%> – <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

But on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You are the ones who have <S%H4191>caused<s%> the <S%H4191>death<s%> of the Lord's <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

It <S%H1961>came<s%> about, however, when the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> had <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that they <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it and the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared.<s%>
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%>
and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7426>"Get<s%> <S%H7426>away<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them <S%H7281>instantly.<s%>" Then they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> your <S%H4289>censer<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> in it <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> [on it;] then <S%H1980>bring<s%> it <S%H4120>quickly<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them, for <S%H7110>wrath<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H5063>plague<s%> has <S%H2490>begun!<s%>"

Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> [it] as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> for <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5063>plague<s%> had <S%H2490>begun<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So he <S%H5414>put<s%> [on] the <S%H7004>incense<s%> and <S%H3722>made<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And he <S%H5975>took<s%> his <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> and the <S%H2416>living,<s%> so that the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>checked.<s%>
